source.name: Department of Education, Office of Hearings & Appeals Decisions
source.description: OHA provides an independent forum for the fair, impartial, equitable, and timely resolution of disputes involving the U.S. Department of Education and recipients of Federal Education Funds. This website publishes decisions issued by OHA and by the Secretary of Education. Decisions posted on OHA's web site are searchable.
